directions: Fill cocktail shaker with ice; add pumpkin liqueur, apple cider, spiced rum, and half-and-half. Cover shaker and shake until outside of shaker is frosted. Pour drink into a martini glass and garnish with whipped cream and nutmeg.
ingredients: 1 cup ice cubes, or as desired
1 tablespoon whipped cream, or to taste
title: Creamy Pumpkin Spice Martini
